mil3.3.10:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.3.10:0.3_0: As long as one’s perceptions lits.
mil3.3.10:1.1_0: “What is the consequence of a great man?”
mil3.3.10:1.4_0: It perceives blue, yellow, red, and white.
mil3.3.10:1.5_0: That’s how perceptions arise in one characteristics.”
mil3.3.10:2.2_0: “Great king, as a storeman in the royal house—are blue-blackened and blue—imed, with blue color, cloak, and blue—when they see sights.
mil3.3.10:2.3_0: That’s how perceptions arise in one characteristics.”
mil3.3.10:4.1_0: Ten Discourses on perception is the tenth section.
